description: This file defines a utility class 'DelegateUtils' within the WPEFramework namespace, providing static inline methods for acquiring a JSON-RPC direct link and safely retrieving string values from a JSON container.

classes.name: DelegateUtils
classes.description: Utility class providing static methods for JSON-RPC link acquisition and safe JSON string retrieval.

methods.name: std::shared_ptr<WPEFramework::Utils::JSONRPCDirectLink> AcquireLink(PluginHost::IShell * shell,const char * callsign)
methods.description: Returns a shared pointer to a JSONRPCDirectLink object for a given shell and callsign, or null if the shell is null.

methods.name: std::string GetStringSafe(const Core::JSON::VariantContainer & vc,const char * key,const char * fallback="UNKNOWN")
methods.description: Safely retrieves a string value associated with a key from a JSON container, returning a fallback string if the content is not a string.

ctags.name: GetStringSafe
ctags.pattern: /^        static inline std::string GetStringSafe(const Core::JSON::VariantContainer& vc, const ch/
ctags.signature: (const Core::JSON::VariantContainer & vc,const char * key,const char * fallback="UNKNOWN")
